title: Repeals section 735 of the real property tax law relating to small claims assessment review determinations
summary: Repeals section 735 of the real property tax law; such section forbids the making of a transcript or testimony in small claims assessment review determinations and their subsequent use as precedent for any other proceeding or purpose.
actClause: AN ACT to repeal section 735 of the real property tax law relating to small claims assessment review determinations
